monster_instances.description: The Young Green Dragon, a creature of boundless ferocity, is a force to be reckoned with. Its scales are a vibrant shade of green, shimmering with an otherworldly radiance. Its piercing eyes, filled with cunning and malice, are a stark contrast to the beauty of its scales. With a wingspan that rivals the breadth of the sky, it soars through the air with an unmatched grace and power. Its breath, a deadly mixture of poison and acid, can obliterate entire forests or settlements in an instant. The dragon's lair, a hidden cave deep within the heart of a dense forest, is a testament to its destructive power. The walls of the cave are adorned with the remains of its past victims, a gruesome trophy room that serves as a reminder of its dominance. Despite its monstrous nature, the dragon is not without a certain air of elegance, its movements fluid and graceful, a stark contrast to its terrifying presence.

additionals.title: The Dragon's Lair
additionals.content: The lair of the Young Green Dragon is a complex network of caves and tunnels, hidden deep within the heart of a dense forest. The entrance is well-camouflaged, blending seamlessly with the surrounding foliage. The interior of the lair is a mix of natural and man-made structures, with the dragon's hoard taking center stage. The hoard is a treasure trove of gold, jewels, and magical artifacts, all carefully sorted and arranged. The dragon has a particular fondness for gold, and it often spends hours polishing its collection. The lair is also home to a menagerie of creatures, from the mundane to the magical, which the dragon has captured over the years. It is not uncommon for the dragon to hold court with these creatures, dispensing wisdom and judgement in a twisted parody of a royal court.

additionals.title: Breath Weapon
additionals.content: The Young Green Dragon's breath weapon is a deadly combination of poison and acid. The dragon can exhale a 30-foot cone of greenish-black gas, which is a potent mix of venom and corrosive acid. Creatures caught within the cone must make a successful Constitution saving throw or suffer the consequences. On a failed save, they take significant damage and are poisoned for a duration of the dragon's choice. The breath weapon is not only a tool of destruction but also a symbol of the dragon's dominance. It is a constant reminder to all who encounter it that the Young Green Dragon is a force to be reckoned with, and its power is not to be underestimated.

additionals.title: The Dragon's Hunger
additionals.content: The Young Green Dragon has an insatiable appetite for power and wealth. It spends most of its time hunting for treasure and magical artifacts, often venturing far from its lair in search of new spoils. The dragon is not particular about its prey, and it will attack anything that it deems a threat or has the potential to provide it with some form of benefit. Despite its size and power, the dragon is not above using guile and cunning to achieve its goals. It is known to infiltrate settlements under the guise of a traveler or merchant, using its charm and wit to gain the trust of its victims before revealing its true nature.

monster_instances.description: The **Green Dragon Wyrmling** is a terrifying creature that has just begun its journey into the world of evil. Its scales are a vibrant *emerald* hue, a stark contrast to its *dark* nature. With its wings spread wide, it appears almost regal as it soars through the sky or glides gracefully over water. The dragon's eyes gleam with malevolence, hinting at the devastation it is capable of causing. Despite its young age, it has already developed a taste for *poison*, using this deadly weapon to take down its prey or enemies with ease. Its **amphibious** nature allows it to hunt both on land and in water, making it a versatile and unpredictable foe.

additionals.title: The Wyrmling's First Hunt
additionals.content: The **Green Dragon Wyrmling** embarks on its first hunt with great anticipation and excitement. It stalks its prey with stealth and cunning, using its natural camouflage to blend seamlessly into the surroundings. As it watches from a hidden vantage point, it marvels at the beauty of its first kill: a majestic stag that stands proudly against a backdrop of towering trees.

additionals.title: The Dragon's First Encounter
additionals.content: In this additionnal we explore how our young dragon encounters other creatures for the first time - both friend and foe - as they shape his perception of his place in this world. We see him interact with other dragons who guide him through his early years; he learns about hierarchy and territory from them.

additionals.title: A Taste for Poison
additionals.content: In this additionnal we delve deeper into how our young dragon develops an affinity for poisonous attacks; how he discovers this new power within himself; how he learns to control it; how he learns when to use it effectively.

monster_instances.description: The Ancient Red Dragon, a gargantuan beast of chaos and destruction, is a sight to behold. Its scales, hard as the toughest armor, glisten like molten lava under the sun. The dragon's eyes, glowing with an infernal light, hold an intelligence that belies its beastly form. Its movements, whether on land, climbing sheer cliffs, or soaring through the sky, are a terrifying blend of power and grace. But it is the dragon's breath, a torrent of fire hot enough to melt stone and incinerate all in its path, that is truly fearsome. This creature is not just a monster, it is a force of nature, reshaping the world around it according to its whims.

additionals.title: The Hoard of the Flame
additionals.content: The Ancient Red Dragon is known to amass vast treasures, its lair filled with gold, jewels, and artifacts of immense power. These treasures are not merely shiny trinkets to the dragon. They are a testament to its power, each piece a trophy from a conquered foe or a tribute from those who seek its favor.

additionals.title: Scorched Earth: The Dragon's Domain
additionals.content: The presence of an Ancient Red Dragon can transform an entire region. Forests become ash-filled wastelands, mountains are reshaped by its fiery breath, and rivers evaporate under its intense heat. Yet, life finds a way to adapt, creating a unique ecosystem around the dragon's lair.

additionals.title: Legends in the Ashes
additionals.content: Tales of the Ancient Red Dragon are told in hushed whispers around campfires. These stories, passed down through generations, speak of its wrath and the devastation it leaves in its wake. Yet, they also speak of brave heroes who dared to challenge the beast, their fates a warning to those who would face the dragon.

monster_instances.description: The Adult Red Dragon is an awe-inspiring creature, its scales radiating like molten fire, its eyes burning with an inner flame. This monstrous beast has a wingspan that spans the heavens, and its roar is a thunderous symphony of doom. The dragon's breath is a torrent of fire that can incinerate anything in its path, leaving only ashes and despair in its wake. It is a harbinger of destruction, a living embodiment of chaos and evil. The tales of its legendary exploits have been passed down through generations, and its name sends shivers down the spine of even the bravest of warriors. The Adult Red Dragon is a force of nature, a living legend that will be remembered for all eternity.

additionals.title: The Dragon's Lair
additionals.content: The Adult Red Dragon's lair is a testament to its fiery nature. The entrance is guarded by a formidable horde of treasure, a smoldering hoard of gold and jewels that glint in the dim light. Beyond the treasure lies a chamber carved from the rock itself, its walls adorned with the skulls of vanquished foes. The chamber is heated by the dragon's own body heat, and the air is thick with the scent of smoke and fire. The lair is a fortress of destruction, a place where the dragon can rest and regain its strength before unleashing its fury upon the world.

additionals.title: The Dragon's Legacy
additionals.content: The Adult Red Dragon is a living legend, its exploits the stuff of epic tales. It has been worshipped as a god by some, its name a curse to others. The dragon's legacy is one of destruction and terror, but it is also a testament to the power of the natural world. The Adult Red Dragon is a symbol of the untamed wilds, a creature that has defied the grasp of civilization and remained a force of nature. The tales of the dragon's exploits have been passed down through generations, inspiring awe and fear in equal measure. The Adult Red Dragon is a symbol of the power of nature, a reminder of the world's untamed and unyielding might.

additionals.title: The Dragon's Bane
additionals.content: The Adult Red Dragon is a creature of fire and chaos, but it is also a target for those seeking to bring about its end. The dragon's legendary status has made it a prize for those seeking power-hungry and ambitious, who seek to claim its hoard and wield its power. The dragon's downfall would be a turning point in the world, a moment of great change and upheaval. The Adult Red Dragon is a symbol of power and chaos, a creature that must be faced or feared. The dragon's downfall would be a moment of great significance, a moment that would change the world forever.

additionals.title: Hunting Patterns
additionals.content: The Young Red Dragon prefers hunting large prey such as deer or wild boar. It often stalks its targets from above before swooping down for a surprise attack. It also enjoys playing with its food by burning or maiming them before consuming them.

additionals.title: Territory Marking
additionals.content: The dragon marks its territory by burning large areas of forest or grassland. It also uses its acidic breath to carve symbols into rocks or cliffs, which serve as warnings to other dragons.

additionals.title: Greedy Nature
additionals.content: The Young Red Dragon is extremely greedy and collects treasures of all kinds. It hoards gold coins, precious gems, magical artifacts, and even items of mundane value in its lair.

monster_instances.description: The Red Dragon Wyrmling is a *young dragon*, still growing and learning. Its *vibrant red scales* gleam in the sunlight, a *bold testament* to its fiery spirit. At *10 feet long* and *15 feet tall*, it is a formidable creature, with *sharp talons* and a *powerful tail*. Its *keen senses* allow it to detect even the slightest disturbance in its surroundings, and its *nimble movements* make it a difficult target to hit. The Wyrmling's *intelligence* and *wisdom* are *growing*, and it is eager to learn from its experiences and to grow stronger, preparing itself for the challenges that lie ahead in its life as a dragon.

additionals.title: Beliefs and Rituals
additionals.content: The Red Dragon Wyrmling, like all dragons, is deeply rooted in tradition and ritual. It believes in the ancient prophecy that foretells the rise of a great dragon who will unite the dragons and rule over the world. The Wyrmling, as a follower of this prophecy, performs rituals to honor its ancestors and to seek the blessings of the dragons. It believes that these rituals will strengthen its connection to its lineage and prepare it for the great destiny that lies ahead.

additionals.title: Reproduction and Growth
additionals.content: The Red Dragon Wyrmling is a young dragon, still growing and learning. It is not yet capable of reproducing, but it is already displaying the characteristics of its species. As it grows, it will develop a more powerful and devastating breath weapon, its scales will become more resistant to damage, and its intelligence and wisdom will increase. The Wyrmling is eager to learn from its experiences and to grow stronger, preparing itself for the challenges that lie ahead in its life as a dragon.

additionals.title: 'The Final Flame: A Tale of Dragonborn Legends'
additionals.content: In the ancient tales of the Dragonborn, there is a story of a great dragon who was the last of its kind. This dragon, known as the Final Flame, was a powerful and wise creature that ruled over a vast territory. It was said that the Final Flame was able to control the elements and that it could see into the hearts of men. The story of the Final Flame is a symbol of hope and inspiration for the Dragonborn, who look to this legendary figure as a role model and a symbol of their own strength and resilience.

additionals.title: The Ancient White Dragon's Lair
additionals.content: The lair of an Ancient White Dragon is typically located in a remote, icy mountain range or deep within an underground cavern system. The lair is filled with treasures plundered from countless battles and conquests over the centuries. The dragon has adapted to its harsh environment, using its Ice Walk ability to navigate the icy terrain with ease.

additionals.title: Hunting Strategies
additionals.content: An Ancient White Dragon is a cunning predator that uses stealth and deception to hunt its prey. It often lies in wait near the entrance of its lair, using its darkvision and blindsight abilities to detect approaching prey from great distances. When an unsuspecting victim enters the dragon's territory, it uses its Frightful Presence to strike fear into their heart before unleashing a devastating breath attack.

additionals.title: Legendary Encounters
additionals.content: An encounter with an Ancient White Dragon is a harrowing experience for any adventurer. The beast's immense size and terrifying presence make it a formidable foe that can easily overwhelm even experienced warriors. However, those who manage to best this legendary creature will find themselves with a tale of heroism that will be passed down for generations.

With each breath, it emits a frosty gust that sends chills down the spine of any who dare to face it. The dragon's presence is both awe-inspiring and terrifying, as it commands respect from all who witness its raw might.

content.title: The Frostbound Legacy

For centuries, it has been the guardian of a hidden treasure trove, a hoard of riches and artifacts that have been amassed over countless generations. The dragon's hoard is a testament to its cunning and strength, a collection of treasures from across the realm that have been won in battle or stolen from the weak. content.title: Dragonborn: The Ties That Bind
content.content: The Adult White Dragon is a member of the Dragonborn, a proud and ancient race of dragons that have ruled the skies for millennia. The Dragonborn are a proud and noble race, their bloodlines tracing back to the very dawn of time. They are a symbol of strength and power, a testament to the enduring spirit of the dragon. The Ties That Bind is a tale of loyalty and duty, a story of the Dragonborn's unwavering commitment to their kin and their quest for dominance over the skies.

content.title: The Hunt for the Frostfang
content.content: The Adult White Dragon is the proud owner of the Frostfang, a legendary weapon forged by the dragons themselves. The Frostfang is a weapon of unparalleled power, its icy blade a symbol of the dragon's dominion over the frozen wastes. The Hunt for the Frostfang is a tale of adventure and intrigue, a story of the dragon's relentless pursuit of the weapon and the lengths it will go to protect it from those who would seek to claim it for their own.

monster_instances.description: The Adult Bronze Dragon is an immense, Huge creature with shimmering scales that reflect the hues of a summer storm. Its eyes are wise and piercing, while its long tail ends in a sharp spike. As an amphibious being, it is equally at home in both air and water. This majestic creature is known for its loyalty to good causes and its strong sense of justice, often serving as a guardian or protector of the weak. Its intelligence allows it to adapt to various situations, making it a formidable foe for those who oppose it.

additionals.title: Breath Weapons: A Force of Nature
additionals.content: The Adult Bronze Dragon's breath weapons are more than just destructive forces; they are also elements of nature itself. The lightning breath represents the raw power of storms, while the repulsion breath embodies the force of wind. These breath weapons not only deal significant damage but also serve as reminders of the dragon's connection to the natural world.

additionals.title: Change Shape: A Master of Disguise
additionals.content: The Adult Bronze Dragon's ability to change shape showcases its adaptability and intelligence. It can assume the form of a humanoid or beast with equal ease, allowing it to blend into various environments and societies. This skill enables the dragon to gather information or carry out covert missions with ease.

additionals.title: Legendary Resistance: Unyielding Determination
additionals.content: The Adult Bronze Dragon's Legendary Resistance is emblematic of its unyielding determination and resilience in the face of adversity. With this ability, the dragon can overcome powerful spells that would otherwise defeat it, demonstrating its strength as both a physical and magical entity.

additionals.title: Frightful Presence: A Fearsome Warning
additionals.content: The Adult Bronze Dragon's Frightful Presence is not just an intimidation tactic; it serves as a warning to those who would oppose it or harm others. By using this ability, the dragon sends a clear message that it will not tolerate evil or cruelty in any form.

monster_instances.description: In the heart of a vast forest of ancient trees, where *golden sunlight* filters through leaves and casts dappled shadows upon the forest floor, lies a realm of untold beauty. It is here that the *Young Bronze Dragon* resides, its scales shimmering with hues of gold and bronze, reflecting the radiant light. This young dragon is a paragon of grace and purity, embodying the essence of its metallic hide. Its eyes are like *liquid gold*, glinting with intelligence and wisdom far beyond its years. The dragon's breath is as powerful as lightning itself, capable of striking fear into the hearts of foes or illuminating dark places. Yet beneath this gleaming exterior lies a heart of *lawful good*, guiding the dragon to protect those who dwell in these enchanted woods.

additionals.title: The Dragon's Sanctuary
additionals.content: *Nestled within an ancient cavern*, this sanctuary is a haven for the Young Bronze Dragon. The walls are adorned with intricate *metallic sculptures*, each one telling a story of valor or sacrifice from previous generations. At the heart of this chamber lies a crystal-clear lake, its waters fed by an underground spring. It is here that the young dragon can often be found meditating or honing its skills.

additionals.title: The Guardian of Balance
additionals.content: Though young, the Young Bronze Dragon has already begun to understand its role as guardian of balance within its woodland domain. It seeks out those who would disrupt this equilibrium, using its formidable breath weapons to ensure harmony prevails.

additionals.title: The Bronze Dragon's Legacy
additionals.content: The Young Bronze Dragon is part of an ancient lineage that has protected these woods for centuries. As it grows into maturity, it will inherit not only immense power but also a solemn responsibility: to continue safeguarding this realm and upholding justice throughout the land.

The wyrmling's breath weapons are powerful but controlled, showing its mastery over its abilities. It is an amphibious creature, comfortable both in water and on land, making it an excellent guardian for both environments.

It can often be found near rivers or lakes where it can swim and hunt for fish or other aquatic creatures. It hunts smaller creatures such as fish, birds, and small mammals for sustenance. However, it is also known to protect weaker creatures from larger predators or threats. Its presence helps to keep populations of smaller animals in check while also ensuring that they do not become too scarce.

additionals.title: Personality

It is intelligent and quick-witted, often engaging in playful banter with those it encounters. Despite its youthful exuberance, it understands the importance of responsibility and duty. monster_instances.description: The Ancient Copper Dragon, a majestic and wise creature, has witnessed the rise and fall of countless civilizations. Its scales, a blend of warm copper and golden hues, shimmer in the sunlight, reflecting the wisdom of ages past. This dragon is known for its benevolent nature, often choosing to protect rather than destroy. However, it is still a dragon, and its might should not be underestimated. The Ancient Copper Dragon's breath weapons are formidable, capable of reducing entire armies to ashes in an instant. Yet, it is not just its power that sets it apart; it is also its cunning intelligence and deep understanding of the world around it.

additionals.title: The Dragon's' History
additionals.content: The Ancient Copper Dragon has seen the rise and fall of countless civilizations, bearing witness to the ebb and flow of power. It has been a silent guardian, a protector of the weak, and a harbinger of change. Its history is a testament to the enduring nature of the dragonkind, a testament to the resilience of the world itself.

additionals.title: The Dragon's' Role in the World
additionals.content: The Ancient Copper Dragon plays a crucial role in maintaining the balance of the world. As a guardian of ancient knowledge, it is responsible for protecting the secrets that could unravel the fabric of reality. It is a symbol of hope and wisdom, a beacon of light in the darkness, guiding those who seek the truth. Its presence is a reminder of the power of knowledge and the importance of using it responsibly, lest it fall into the wrong hands.

additionals.title: The Dragon's' Relationship with Other Creatures
additionals.content: The Ancient Copper Dragon is a revered figure among the creatures of the world. Its wisdom and power are respected by all, and it is often sought out for guidance and protection. Younger dragons look up to it as a mentor and role model, while other creatures, both magical and mundane, see it as a symbol of hope and wisdom. The dragon's presence brings a sense of peace and stability to the world, and its influence can be felt far and wide.

It has an impressive *hit points* total of 184 (16d12 + 80), ensuring it is no easy foe. Its speed is **40 ft.** on land, with an additional **40 ft.** climb speed and **80 ft.** fly speed, making it highly mobile. Its *dexterity_save*, *constitution_save*, *wisdom_save*, and *charisma_save* are 6, 10, 7, and 8 respectively. Its abilities include **Legendary Resistance (3/Day)**, allowing it to reroll failed saving throws once per long rest. It speaks both **Common** and **Draconic**, adding to its intelligence and charm. The dragon has a formidable challenge rating of **14**, making it a powerful adversary for adventurers.

content.title: Draconic Wisdom
content.content: The *Adult Copper Dragon* is a repository of ancient knowledge, having seen and experienced countless events throughout its long life. Its vast wisdom is not only a testament to its age, but also a reflection of the dragons' innate curiosity and thirst for knowledge. This wisdom is passed down through generations, with each new dragon learning from the experiences of its predecessors. The dragons' collective knowledge is a treasure trove of information, covering everything from the history of the world to the secrets of magic and the workings of the universe.

content.title: The Art of Flight
content.content: The *Adult Copper Dragon* is a master of flight, its powerful wings allowing it to soar through the skies with ease. This skill is not only a result of its physical prowess, but also a testament to the dragons' innate affinity for the skies. The dragons have honed their flying abilities over centuries of practice, learning to navigate the skies with precision and grace. Their aerial prowess is a symbol of their freedom and independence, allowing them to move swiftly and unhindered across the world.

content.title: The Dragons' Code
content.content: The dragons follow a strict code of conduct, governed by a set of unwritten rules that have been passed down through generations. This code is a reflection of the dragons' chaotic good nature, balancing their desire for freedom and independence with their sense of responsibility towards others. The dragons' code dictates that they must protect the weak and uphold justice, even as they pursue their own interests. It also forbids them from causing unnecessary harm or destruction, and requires them to respect the rights and property of others.

additionals.title: The Art of Flight

monster_instances.description: In a realm where gold is revered as a symbol of purity and divine grace, the **Young Gold Dragon** stands as a beacon of hope. Its **Large** frame is adorned with scales that shimmer like liquid gold under the sun's rays, reflecting the dragon's inherent nobility. With an **alignment** of lawful good, it is known to protect those in need and uphold justice. Its **dexterity_save** of 6 and **wisdom_save** of 5 showcase its agility and wisdom in navigating complex situations. The dragon's **perception** of 9 allows it to detect even the slightest disturbances in its surroundings. As an amphibious creature, it is equally at home in both air and water, thanks to its **amphibious special ability**. Its **languages** include Common and Draconic, enabling it to communicate with a wide range of creatures.

additionals.title: The Dragon's Purpose
additionals.content: The Young Gold Dragon's purpose is not only to protect but also to guide those who seek truth and justice. It is believed that this noble creature has been bestowed with divine powers by the gods themselves. These powers manifest as its unique breath weapons: fire breath, which can scorch all in its path; and weakening breath, which can weaken opponents physically while leaving them mentally unscathed.

additionals.title: The Legendary Guardian
additionals.content: Legend has it that when a Young Gold Dragon appears in a land plagued by darkness or chaos, it heralds a new era of peace and prosperity. This noble creature serves as a guardian for those who follow the path of righteousness, using its powers to vanquish evil forces that threaten the balance between good and evil.

additionals.title: The Dragon's Sanctuary
additionals.content: The Young Gold Dragon's sanctuary is said to be hidden deep within a lush forest or an ancient mountain range. This sacred place serves as a refuge for those who seek solace from the world's troubles. The dragon protects this sanctuary with all its might, ensuring that peace reigns within its boundaries.

monster_instances.description: Golden scales shimmering like the sun's first rays, the Gold Dragon Wyrmling is a symbol of hope and purity. Despite its young age, it already possesses a fierce determination to protect the innocent and uphold justice. Its eyes, filled with wisdom beyond its years, are a beacon of guidance for those who seek a better path. The Wyrmling's breath is a force to be reckoned with, capable of both creating and destroying life. Its fire can warm the hearts of the cold and weary, while its weakening breath can bring even the strongest to their knees. The Gold Dragon Wyrmling is a force of nature, a living embodiment of the balance between strength and compassion.

additionals.title: The Golden Guardian
additionals.content: The Gold Dragon Wyrmling is often seen as a guardian of treasures and relics, its presence warding off evil and malice. It is believed that the Wyrmling's golden scales are imbued with the power of the sun, making it a symbol of hope and purity.

additionals.title: The Breath of Life
additionals.content: The Gold Dragon Wyrmling's fire breath is not only a weapon, but also a tool for creation. It is said that the Wyrmling can use its fire to breathe life into inanimate objects, giving them a new purpose and a chance to thrive.

additionals.title: The Weakening Touch
additionals.content: The Gold Dragon Wyrling's weakening breath is a powerful tool, capable of leveling the playing field in a battle. By weakening its enemies, the Wyrmling can ensure that justice prevails and the weak are protected from the strong.

monster_instances.senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 26

special_abilities.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
special_abilities.description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Claw.
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +17 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit:17 (2d6 + 10) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail.
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +17 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit:19 (2d8 + 10) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Frightful Presence.
actions.description: Each creature of the dragon’s choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a DC 21 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature’s saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon’s Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

actions.name: Breath Weapons (Recharge 5-6).
actions.description: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons.

actions.name: Cold Breath.
actions.description: The dragon exhales an icy blast in a 90--foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 24 Constitution saving throw, taking 67 (15d8) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Paralyzing Breath.
actions.description: The dragon exhales paralyzing gas in a 90--foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 24 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Change Shape.
actions.description: The dragon magically polymorphs into a humanoid or beast that has a challenge rating no higher than its own, or back into its true form. It reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (the dragon’s choice). In a new form, the dragon retains its alignment, hit points, Hit Dice, ability to speak, proficiencies, Legendary Resistance, lair actions, and Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores, as well as this action. Its statistics and capabilities are otherwise replaced by those of the new form, except any class features or legendary actions of that form. The dragon can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature’s turn. The dragon regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

monster_instances.description: In the *mist-shrouded peaks of the Silvermountains*, an *ancient silver dragon* stands as a testament to the enduring power of nature. With *a body shimmering like liquid mercury*, this majestic creature is adorned with *scales that reflect the moonlight like a thousand silver mirrors*. Its *eyes hold the wisdom of countless ages*, while its *talons* are sharpened to razor precision by years of hunting. The dragon's breath is colder than the icy winds that howl through the mountains, freezing even the stoutest hearts with fear. Yet, despite its fearsome visage, it is also a guardian of life, protecting the delicate balance of nature in its domain. Its voice echoes through the mountains like a silver bell, calling forth storms and guiding lost travelers back to safety. In times of need, it rises from its slumber to defend its home from those who would threaten it.

content.title: The Guardian's Legacy
content.content: The ancient silver dragon's legacy is a tale of endurance and resilience, passed down through generations of mountain dwellers. As the guardian of the Silvermountains, it has protected the land and its inhabitants from countless threats, ensuring the survival of countless species. Its wisdom and strength have become a symbol of hope and inspiration, a beacon of light in the darkest hours. The dragon's influence can be seen in the thriving ecosystems of the mountains, where life flourishes despite the harsh conditions. The dragon's story is a testament to the power of nature and the importance of preserving the delicate balance of life.

content.title: Silvermountains: A History of Survival
content.content: The Silvermountains, home to the ancient silver dragon, are a land of contrasts. From the icy peaks that pierce the sky to the lush valleys that cradle life, the mountains are a testament to the resilience of nature. The region's history is a tale of survival, as countless species have adapted to the harsh conditions and thrived in the face of adversity. The ancient silver dragon's presence has played a crucial role in the region's survival, as it has protected the land from threats both natural and unnatural. The mountains' rich history is a testament to the power of nature and the importance of preserving the delicate balance of life.

additionals.title: The Dragon's Lair: A Sanctuary in Stone

content.title: The Dragon's Lair: A Sanctuary in Stone
content.content: Deep within the heart of the Silvermountains lies the ancient silver dragon's lair, a sanctuary carved from the very stone of the mountains themselves. The lair is a marvel of nature and architecture, a testament to the dragon's immense power and wisdom. The cavernous chamber is adorned with intricate carvings and glittering crystals, reflecting the dragon's silver scales and the moonlight that filters in through the entrance. The lair is a place of refuge and solitude, where the dragon can rest and recharge its strength, preparing for the challenges that lie ahead. The sanctuary is a symbol of the dragon's enduring presence and the importance of preserving the delicate balance of life in the Silvermountains.

monster_instances.description: The Adult Silver Dragon is a massive Huge dragon with a large frame covered in shimmering silver scales. Its powerful wings allow it to fly at incredible speeds, while its large size makes it a formidable opponent in combat. As a lawful good creature, the dragon is known for its wisdom and fairness, often acting as a guardian or protector of good-aligned beings. The dragon's breath weapons are particularly devastating, with a cold breath attack capable of dealing massive damage and a paralyzing breath attack that can immobilize enemies. Additionally, the dragon has the ability to change shape, allowing it to blend into its surroundings or assume a different form to better suit its needs.

additionals.title: Legendary Resistance
additionals.content: The Adult Silver Dragon has the ability to use Legendary Resistance three times per day. This allows it to automatically succeed on any saving throw it fails against spells or other magical effects.

additionals.title: Frightful Presence
additionals.content: The dragon's Frightful Presence ability can be particularly intimidating, causing creatures within 120 feet to become frightened if they fail their Wisdom saving throw. This can have a significant impact on the battlefield, as frightened creatures are likely to flee or become disoriented.

additionals.title: Change Shape
additionals.content: The Adult Silver Dragon's Change Shape ability allows it to magically polymorph into a humanoid or beast with a challenge rating no higher than its own. This gives the dragon incredible flexibility in combat situations and can help it adapt to various challenges.

monster_instances.description: The Young Silver Dragon is a majestic and noble creature, with a large frame covered in shimmering silver scales. Its wings spread wide, allowing it to fly with ease at speeds of up to 80 feet per round. This dragon's breath weapons are formidable, with the ability to unleash a freezing blast of cold air or paralyzing gas that can leave its foes helpless. Despite its fearsome appearance and abilities, the Young Silver Dragon is guided by a strong sense of justice and will often aid those in need.

additionals.title: The Silver Dragon's Lair
additionals.content: Young Silver Dragons typically make their lairs in high, secluded places such as mountain peaks or remote forests. Their lairs are filled with treasures hoarded from their adventures and battles. These treasures often include magical items that reflect the dragon's noble nature.

additionals.title: The Silver Dragon's Wisdom
additionals.content: Young Silver Dragons are wise beyond their years, thanks to their innate ability to absorb knowledge from the world around them. They possess an encyclopedic knowledge of history, lore, and magic, which they use to guide their actions and decisions.

additionals.title: The Silver Dragon's Ally
additionals.content: Despite their fearsome appearance and abilities, Young Silver Dragons are known to be allies of good-aligned creatures. They will often come to the aid of those who are in danger or need assistance, using their powers to protect the innocent and uphold justice.

monster_instances.description: In the heart of the **icy mountains**, where *silver moonlight* casts an enchanting glow upon the snow-covered peaks, lies a realm of untold beauty. It is here that the *Silver Dragon Wyrmling* resides, its shimmering scales reflecting the radiant light. This young dragon is a paragon of grace and purity, embodying the essence of its silver hue. Its eyes are like *diamonds*, glinting with intelligence and wisdom far beyond its years. The dragon's breath is as cold as the mountains themselves, capable of freezing foes in their tracks or reducing them to ice. Yet beneath this frosty exterior lies a heart of *lawful good*, guiding the dragon to protect those who dwell in these harsh lands.

additionals.title: The Dragon's Sanctuary
additionals.content: *Nestled within an ancient cavern*, this sanctuary is a haven for the Silver Dragon Wyrmling. The walls are adorned with intricate *ice sculptures*, each one telling a story of valor or sacrifice from previous generations. At the heart of this chamber lies a crystal-clear lake, its waters fed by an underground spring. It is here that the young dragon can often be found meditating or honing its skills.

additionals.title: The Guardian of Balance
additionals.content: Though young, the Silver Dragon Wyrmling has already begun to understand its role as guardian of balance within its mountainous domain. It seeks out those who would disrupt this equilibrium, using its formidable breath weapons to ensure harmony prevails.

additionals.title: The Silver Dragon's Legacy
additionals.content: The Silver Dragon Wyrmling is part of an ancient lineage that has protected these mountains for centuries. As it grows into maturity, it will inherit not only immense power but also a solemn responsibility: to continue safeguarding this realm and upholding justice throughout the land.

monster_instances.description: The Dragon Turtle is a colossal creature of ancient origin, with a massive shell that appears to have been carved from obsidian. Its *_serpentine_ tail_weaves through the water with graceful ease, while its **_flame-like_ tail_** glistens with every movement. The creature's **_scarred_ visage_** reveals a history of fierce battles fought against its many foes over time. Its **_webbed_ feet_** allow it to move swiftly through the water with ease. The Dragon Turtle is a sight to behold, as its **_majestic presence_** can strike fear into even the bravest of hearts.

additionals.title: The Dragon Turtle's Origins
additionals.content: *The ancient legends speak of a time when dragons ruled the world with an iron fist. Among these dragons was a fearsome creature known as the Dragon Turtle. Said to have been born from volcanic eruptions that shook the earth itself, it was believed that this colossal being was responsible for creating many of the world's largest bodies of water.*

additionals.title: The Dragon Turtle's Role in Ecosystem
additionals.content: *Though often seen as a terrifying beast by those who encounter it, the Dragon Turtle plays an essential role in maintaining balance within its aquatic domain.*

additionals.title: The Legend of The Lost City
additionals.content: *A tale told among sailors speaks of a lost city submerged beneath the waves, guarded by a colossal Dragon Turtle. It is said that this ancient city holds untold riches and knowledge beyond human comprehension.*

The drider's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 13). The drider can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: dancing lights

special_abilities.name: Spider Climb
special_abilities.description: The drider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

special_abilities.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
special_abilities.description: While in sunlight, the drider has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

special_abilities.name: Web Walker
special_abilities.description: The drider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

actions.name: Multiattack.
actions.description: The drider makes three attacks, either with its longsword or its longbow. It can replace one of those attacks with a bite attack.

actions.name: Bite.
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit:2 (1d4) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) poison damage.

actions.name: Longsword.
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit:7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 +3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Longbow.
actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit:7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) poison damage.

monster_instances.description: The *Drider* is a terrifying amalgamation of spider and elven features, with its humanoid upper body fused to a spider's lower half. Its piercing eyes gleam with malevolence as it stalks its prey through the shadows. Its poisonous bite is deadly to those who are unlucky enough to be caught in its grasp, while its longsword and longbow allow it to strike from a distance. The drider is notoriously difficult to kill due to its innate spellcasting abilities and resistance to charm magic. This monstrosity thrives in dark, damp environments where it can easily ambush unsuspecting victims.

additionals.title: The Drider's Origins
additionals.content: In ancient times, _fey_ magic went awry during an experiment to merge human and spider traits. The result was the creation of the first Drider. Over time, these creatures have evolved into cunning hunters who use their unique abilities to prey on unsuspecting adventurers.

additionals.title: The Drider's Hunting Techniques
additionals.content: Surviving an encounter with a Drider requires keen senses and quick reflexes. These eldritch abominations are known for their stealthy nature and ability to blend into shadows. They often stalk their prey from above or below, using their _Web Walker_ ability to navigate difficult terrain with ease. To escape a Drider's grasp, one must rely on their intuition and agility.

additionals.title: The Drider's Weaknesses
additionals.content: While a Drider may seem like an unstoppable force of darkness and poison, there are certain weaknesses that can be exploited. The creature is highly sensitive to sunlight, which can disrupt its predatory abilities. Additionally, while it has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, it remains vulnerable to other forms of magic.

monster_instances.name: Dryad

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_abilities.description:
The dryad's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 14). The dryad can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

At will: druidcraft
3/day each: entangle, goodberry
1/day each: barkskin, pass without trace, shillelagh

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.description: The dryad has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Speak with Beasts and Plants
special_abilities.description: The dryad can communicate with beasts and plants as if they shared a language.

special_abilities.name: Tree Stride
special_abilities.description: Once on her turn, the dryad can use 10 ft. of her movement to step magically into one living tree within her reach and emerge from a second living tree within 60 ft. of the first tree, appearing in an unoccupied space within 5 ft. of the second tree. Both trees must be large or bigger.

actions.name: Club.
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit (+6 to hit with shillelagh), reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage, or 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage with shillelagh.

actions.name: Fey Charm.
actions.description: The dryad targets one humanoid or beast that she can see within 30 feet of her. If the target can see the dryad, it must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or be magically charmed. The charmed creature regards the dryad as a trusted friend to be heeded and protected. Although the target isn’t under the dryad’s control, it takes the dryad’s requests or actions in the most favorable way it can.  Each time the dryad or its allies do anything harmful to the target, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. Otherwise, the effect lasts 24 hours or until the dryad dies, is on a different plane of existence from the target, or ends the effect as a bonus action. If a target’s saving throw is successful, the target is immune to the dryad’s Fey Charm for the next 24 hours.  The dryad can have no more than one humanoid and up to three beasts charmed at a time.

monster_instances.description: The Dryad is a fey creature of ethereal beauty, her body intertwined with the branches of her tree home. Her skin is as smooth as bark, her hair like leaves rustling in a gentle breeze. Her eyes are pools of emerald green that seem to hold the wisdom of the forest itself. She moves with grace and fluidity, as if she were one with the trees around her. Her voice is soft and melodic, echoing through the woods like a songbird's call. Despite her delicate appearance, she is a formidable protector of her forest home, using her innate spellcasting abilities to ward off any threats that may dare to enter her domain.

additionals.title: The Forest Guardian
additionals.content: The Dryad is not only a beautiful creature but also a fierce protector of her forest home. She uses her innate spellcasting abilities to ward off any threats that may dare to enter her domain. With spells like _entangle_ and _pass without trace_, she can hinder intruders while helping her animal allies navigate through the dense foliage.

additionals.title: A Bond with Nature
additionals.content: The Dryad has an unbreakable connection with nature, able to communicate with both animals and plants as if they shared a language. This bond allows her to rally creatures great and small to defend their shared home from any threat.

additionals.title: A Magical Lineage
additionals.content: As part of the ancient fey lineage, Dryads are imbued with powerful magic. Their innate spellcasting abilities allow them to wield spells such as _druidcraft_, _goodberry_, _barkskin_, and _shillelagh_ without needing material components.

special_abilities.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
special_abilities.description: While in sunlight, the duergar has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Enlarge (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest).
actions.description: For 1 minute, the duergar magically increases in size, along with anything it is wearing or carrying. While enlarged, the duergar is Large, doubles its damage dice on Strength--based weapon attacks (included in the attacks), and makes Strength checks and Strength saving throws with advantage. If the duergar lacks the room to become Large, it attains the maximum size possible in the space available.
